bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.summary: x-axis label of Intermediate result is incorrect.
bug.description: currently it is set as "Trial", it's right for the Top 10 diagram, but for Intermediate result of one single trial, this x-axis' label should be "sequence id" (of this trial). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/74023706-3ee3bf80-49db-11ea-87d6-51d04dbfc977.png></denchmark-link>
